knowledgecenter.Title: Ask a Question
knowledgecenter.NoResultsTextUnder: We're sorry but we could not find a suitable answer for you.

knowledgecenter.ArticleHelpfulnessNoDesc: We're sorry that the article wasn't a good match for your search. We thank you for your feedback!

knowledgecenter.UnansweredMessage: Results for query '<%UnansweredQuery%>' have been marked as unanswered.
